message.body: Yes, I stay up another month at Last Drop! And on Tuesday at our monthly meeting, we can plan upcoming artist meetings
I'll switch the showcard at Last Drop to ones that show correct dates ASAP
Also on Sunday I'll take out the boxed wine I left there- Srry about that :/
...if it's still here Sunday.
Also, I'm meeting with Katie this weekend since she'll be in town, but we'll roll from there on other meetings.
Lol
What time this weekend? Let me know and I'll try to make it too
Prolly Sunday afternoon, since that's really the only good time for me.
In the event you can't make it, here are some samples:
Right?! She's got tons and can make more and I mostly want to see if we can cover the LD in them.
In Watermelon Sugar on my end.
Omg the Joan Didion! I want it!
Richard brautigan the abortion is my fave book!!!
This is great I love it!
Oh man yes!!!! In watermelon sugar is so much dreamier/abstract!
And yes soooo goooood
There is a little store in bmore that sells cutesy home decor that's called In Watermelon sugar
Fun fact. Pretty sure it's in homage of the book
Lovely! Can't wait to meet her. I work til 3 Sunday but you can tell me all about it and cc me on emails
I love that they're all over the place. Musicians, Authors, Artists, Athletes, Actors, Politicians. They're amazing.
Yes! I like these too! See you soon xoxo
Just met with Katie, went great! Scheduled her for May/June.

Annie's up in January, right? I have no clue what's going on with Thom, it didn't sound like he knew he was scheduled for a show when I talked to him. If so, I think we could rearrange so Matt keeps February. Leaving March and April.
